channel.title: Pytorch on T|A
channel.description: Recent content in Pytorch on T|A

item.title: NOTES: TensorFlow, TorchDynamo, and TorchInductor
item.description: My reading notes on two generations of ML system papers: TensorFlow’s distributed execution model and PyTorch 2.0’s compiler stack (TorchDynamo + TorchInductor).

item.title: PROJECT: Galaxy Zooing my first CNN
item.description: VGG architectures, galaxy morphology classification, cross-validation, and way too much time spent on data augmentation
